caption.center: A.C. BEALS COMPANY, INC. v. RHODE ISLAND HOSPITAL v.

opinion.posture: Motion of third-party defendant for leave to file petition for certiorari granted.

Jordan, Hanson Curran, A. Lauriston Parks, for plaintiff.
Edwards Angell, Stephen A. Fanning, Jr., Paul F. Greene, for Rhode Island Hospital, defendant.
